title: Add Withdrawal Amount Selection UI (Step 1)

requirements.text: Create a new Withdrawal page (frontend/src/pages/Withdrawal.tsx) that displays four withdrawal amount buttons: ₹100, ₹200, ₹500, and ₹1000. The user should be able to tap a button to select that amount, with the selected amount visually highlighted. Style it consistently with the existing dark navy/gold theme.

quotes: Ha chote step me hi kar do

acceptanceCriteria: A Withdrawal page exists at frontend/src/pages/Withdrawal.tsx
Tapping a button highlights it as selected
Only one amount can be selected at a time
Page uses the existing dark navy/gold color scheme

requirements.text: Add a 'Withdraw' navigation entry to the bottom navigation bar (BottomNav.tsx) or make the Withdrawal page accessible from the Account page via a 'Withdraw' button, so users can navigate to the new Withdrawal page.
acceptanceCriteria: User can navigate to the Withdrawal page from within the app
The route for the Withdrawal page is registered in App.tsx

constraints: Do not add UPI ID input or backend submission in this step — only amount selection UI
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
Keep changes minimal to avoid build failures
nonGoals: UPI ID input field (to be added in a later step)
Backend withdrawal request submission (to be added in a later step)
